5.name: Sol
5.text:
"Ooooo... An artifact...! A legendary magical
relic created in ancient times..."

6.name: Sol
6.text:
"You can collect it as a part of your collection,
or use it in battle...! Amazing!!"

7.name: Sol
7.text:
"Once you get one, the desire for more starts to
grow... I want to collect lots and lots of
them!!!"

11.name: Eric
11.text:
"Calm down, Sol-chan. It's not scary, it's not
scary."

17.name: Sol
17.text: "Ooooo... the bitterness and the aroma of hops..."

18.name: Sol
18.text:
"Ooooh... the exquisite aroma of the barrel and
the rich flavor..."

19.name: Sol
19.text:
"Ooooh... the aroma of matured grapes is so
rich..."

20.name: Sol
20.text:
"Ooooh... the sweetness and aroma of honey are
unparalleled..."

22.name: Sol
22.text:
"I'm going to eat gold coins! Such a luxurious
snack..."

23.name: Sol
23.text:
"I'm going to eat pearls! (gulp gulp) Smooth, with
a sharpness, and delicious..."

24.name: Sol
24.text:
"I'm going to eat gold nuggets! Mmm... Mmm... It
feels like the taste of home... Natsukashii...
It's like the taste of gold nuggets, isn't it?"

25.name: Sol
25.text:
"This is... an emerald! Let's see... Ohhh... it
has a surprising sourness... A refreshing
flavor..."

26.name: Sol
26.text:
"Ooooh... a large ruby... A dandy taste beyond the
cloudy glass..."

27.name: Sol
27.text:
"Ooooh... a diamond... It's rich and deep...
Hmm... Yes... Yes... The taste of a skilled
craftsman..."

29.name: Sol
29.text:
"Grilled whole chicken!! Here I go!! Delicious...
delicious..."

30.name: Sol
30.text:
"Black bread! Here I go!! Mmm... Mmm...
delicious!!"

31.name: Sol
31.text:
"Berry pie! The recommended product of this
village! It's sweet and sour, and delicious, isn't
it?!"

32.name: Sol
32.text:
"Onion stew! The depth of flavor is three-
dimensional!!"

33.name: Sol
33.text:
"Venison! It's a favorite food of mine! Thank you,
Mr. Deer!!"

34.name: Eric
34.text:
"I wonder if this child understands what she's
saying..."
